Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供将控件组合在一起的功能。

span.span: Provides the capability to group controls together.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗体表示 ASP.NET 移动网页中控件的最外面的分组。A form represents the outermost grouping of controls within an ASP.NET mobile Web page. 单个移动网页可以在最外层包含多个窗体。An individual mobile Web page can contain multiple forms at the outermost level. 窗体不能嵌套;如果要嵌套容器, 请使用控件。Forms cannot be nested; use controls if you want to nest containers. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[窗体控件简介](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/dxzx3ss0(v=vs.85))。For more information, see [Introduction to the Form Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/dxzx3ss0(v=vs.85)). 若要显示特定窗体, 请将当前页上的属性设置为所需的窗体, 或将控件中的属性设置为所需的窗体。To display a specific form, either set the property on the current page to the desired form, or set the property in a control to the desired form. 可以在控件的文本内容中包含文本以及其随附的标记。You can include literal text along with its accompanying markup tags in the text contents of the control. 使用模板时, 务必记住 , 控件在窗体的方法中创建模板的实例。When using templates, it is important to remember that the control creates instances of templates in the method for the form. 窗体的方法在和`Page_Init`之前`Page_Load`调用。The method for the form is called before `Page_Load` and `Page_Init`. 此外, 由于尚未创建窗体, 因此页构造函数的执行过于早, 无法在方法中设置模板。Also, the page constructor executes too early to set templates in the method because the form is not yet created. 若要更正此错误, 请挂钩窗体自己的方法, 并在其中创建模板的实例。To correct this, hook the form's own method, and create an instance of the template there. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[实现模板渲染](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b86d9d1d-ab18-4cad-a825-092826bb3922)。For more information, see [Implementing Templated Rendering](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b86d9d1d-ab18-4cad-a825-092826bb3922). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个具有两个窗体的页以及两个窗体之间的链接。The following code example shows how to create a page with two forms along with links between the two forms. 一个窗体具有复选框列表。One form has a check box list. 选择项并单击 "**提交**" 按钮后, 窗体将显示选定项及其值的列表。When items are selected and the **Submit** button is clicked, the form presents a list of the selected items and their values. 请注意, 事件方法准备显示的相应窗体Notice that the event methods prepare the respective forms for display > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileFormSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The URL to which the form is submitted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为空字符串 ("") 将导致回发到包含当前窗体的页面。The default value, an empty string (""), causes postbacks to the page containing the current form. 您可以重写默认值以将窗体提交到不同的 URL。You can override the default value to submit the form to a different URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果继承属性, 则控件会将窗体内容发布到继承的 URL。If the property is inherited, the control posts form contents to the inherited URL.

span.span: Introduction to the Form Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Activate As EventHandler

summary.span: 当激活窗体时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a form becomes active.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生在下列情况下:The event occurs under the following circumstances: - 第一次请求页面时, 将激活第一个窗体。When a page is first requested, the first form is activated. - 以编程方式设置页面的属性时。When the property of the page is set programmatically. - 当用户通过其目标为窗体的控件导航到窗体时。When the user navigates to a form through a control whose target is a form. 此事件在事件链中的位置使得将子控件绑定到数据源或设置可由所有子控件继承的窗体属性非常重要。This event's position in the event chain makes it very important for binding child controls to data sources or for setting a form property that can be inherited by all child controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将`OnActivate` 元素中的属性设置为指向事件发生时执行的方法。The following code example shows how to set the `OnActivate` attribute in the element to point to a method that executes when the event occurs. `Form2_Activate`方法准备要显示的第二个窗体。The `Form2_Activate` method prepares the second form for display. 此示例摘自一个更大的概述示例。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#8)]

summary.span: 获取或设置可以分页的窗体上的控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the control on the form that can be paginated.

summary.span: 默认值为 （在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: The default is ( in Visual Basic).

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 可以分页的窗体上的控件。

span.span: The control on the form that can be paginated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于允许窗体上的单个控件将其内容分页到移动设备上的多个视图中, 并提供视图之间的下一个和上一个导航。The property is used to allow a single control on a form to paginate its contents across several views on mobile devices and providing next and previous navigation between views. 即使包含控件将其属性设置为, `false`控件也可以对其内容进行分页。A control can paginate its contents even if a containing control has its property set to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类的属性来指定要分页的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of the class to specify which control to paginate. 该示例创建一个具有两个窗体的页面。The example creates a page with two forms. 一个窗体具有一个非常长的字符串, 必须对某些设备进行分页以使用户能够访问整个文本。One form has a very long string that on some devices must be paginated to give the user access to the entire text. 若要查看操作中的分页, 必须查看处理分页的设备上的示例。In order to see the pagination in action, you must view the example on a device that handles pagination. 在[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]中, 可以使用 "**工具**" 菜单上的 "**设备仿真器管理器**" 中提供的一个设备仿真程序。In [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you can use one of the device emulators available with the **Device Emulator Manager** on the **Tools** menu. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileFormSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default2.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CreateDefaultTemplatedUI(bool doDataBind) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CreateDefaultTemplatedUI (doDataBind As Boolean)

param.name: doDataBind
param.span: 如果实例化模板必须绑定到可用数据（通常在第一次请求时发生这种情况），则设置为 true。

span.span: Set to true if the instantiated templates must bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).

param.span: 如果模板不能绑定到数据，而要依靠视图状态填充这些模板（通常在后续回发时发生这种情况），则设置为 false。

span.span: Set to false if the templates must not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).

summary.span: 当活动窗体变为非活动窗体时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an active form becomes inactive.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列情况下, 窗体将变为非活动状态:A form becomes inactive under the following circumstances: - 当页的属性以编程方式设置为另一个窗体时。When the property of the page is programmatically set to another form. - 当用户通过其目标为窗体的控件导航到窗体时。When the user navigates to a form through a control whose target is a form. 如果这两个操作都不发生, 则活动窗体将永远不会收到事件。If neither of these actions occurs, the active form will never receive a event. 此事件在事件链中的位置使得重置子控件、数据集或全局变量非常重要。This event's position in the event chain makes it very important in resetting the child controls, data set, or global variables. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何捕获事件以清除。The following code example demonstrates how to trap the event to clear the . 此示例摘自一个更大的概述示例。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default2.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#5)] 在此示例中, 由于没有为``元素指定筛选器, 因此它将始终为。In this example, since no filter is specified for the `` element, it will always be the . 若要指定筛选器, 请将元素``更改为: 并包含一个 web.config 文件, 用于定义要使用的筛选器。To specify a filter change the element to: `` and include a Web.config file that defines the filters you want to use. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IList GetLinkedForms(int32 optimumPageWeight) cil managed
Public Function GetLinkedForms (optimumPageWeight As Integer) As IList

param.name: optimumPageWeight
param.span: 不能超过得到的链接窗体的目标设备的总权重（在分页中使用）。

span.span: The total weight for the target device of the resulting linked forms must not exceed (used in pagination).

param.span: 如果其值为 -1，则将链接窗体添加到列表时将不考虑总权重。

span.span: If its value is -1, the total weight will not be considered when linked forms are added to the list.

summary.span: 返回链接到当前窗体的一组窗体。

span.span: Returns a set of forms that are linked to the current form.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

returns.span: 链接到当前窗体的窗体集。

span.span: A set of forms that are linked to the current form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当窗体包含激活其他窗体而不与服务器交互的导航元素时, 该窗体将被视为链接窗体。When a form contains navigation elements that activate another form without interacting with the server, it is considered to be a linked form. 有几个因素涉及窗体被视为已链接。There are several factors involved for a form to be considered linked. 例如, 如果满足以下三个规定, 则窗体 B 将被视为链接到窗体 A 的窗体:For example, if the following three stipulations are met, Form B is considered to be one of the forms linked to Form A: - 窗体 a 包含其目标为窗体 B 的控件。Form A contains a control with its destination as Form B. - 窗体 A 不包含事件处理程序。Form A does not contain an event handler. - 窗体 B 没有事件处理程序。Form B has no event handler. 区别是所有窗体的集合, 这些窗体不需要服务器交互即可在之间传输控件。The distinction is the set of all forms that do not require server interactions to transfer control between.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `get`请求仅限于它可以发布的数据量。A `get` request is limited in the amount of data it can post. 当使用`get`请求时, 某些类型的回发可能会失败。Some types of postbacks might fail when using a `get` request. `get`请求的优点是所有参数都指定为 url 的一部分, 并且可以缓存或保存 url。The advantage of a `get` request is that all the parameters are specified as part of the URL, and the URL can be cached or saved. `post`请求的元素包含在中。The elements of a `post` request are contained within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过此方法通知时, 服务器控件必须执行创建和设置实例所需的任何初始化步骤。When notified by this method, server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在服务器控件生命周期的此阶段中, 尚未填充控件的视图状态。In this stage of the server control's lifecycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外, 如果调用此方法, 则不能访问其他服务器控件, 不管该方法是此控件的子控件还是父控件。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called either, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 不一定要创建其他服务器控件并准备好进行访问。Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.

span.span: The form is contained by another form.

summary.span: 对窗体进行分页之后，返回窗体中的页数。

span.span: Returns the number of pages in the form after the form is paginated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件公开属性和属性, 该属性提供有关如何对当前窗体进行分页的信息。 The control exposes the property and the property, which provide information about how the current form is paginated. 属性还有助于将导航功能提供给另一页。The property also helps provide navigation capability to another page. 例如, 当在更丰富的设备上呈现时, 搜索结果窗体可能包含特定于设备的 UI 元素, 这些元素允许用户通过数字而不是链接导航来浏览结果页。For example, when rendering on a richer device, a search results form might include device-specific UI elements that allow the user to browse to a page of results by number rather than by link navigation. > [!NOTE] > 此值在事件发生后可用。This value is available after the event has occurred. 若要获取属性, 可以处理窗体的事件。To get the property, you can handle the event of the form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of the control. 此代码示例摘自一个更大的属性示例。This code example is part of a larger example for the property. [!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default2.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以编程方式设置此属性, 则不会为每个请求保留该属性。If this property is set programmatically, it is not persisted for each request. 如果以声明方式设置该属性, 则会为每个请求保留该属性。If the property is set declaratively, the property is persisted for each request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自一个更大的属性示例。This code example is from a larger example for the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呈现每个请求之前对窗体进行分页。A form is paginated prior to rendering each request. 分页完成后, 将发生事件。After pagination is complete, the event occurs. 此事件发生后, 窗体的属性包含窗体的实际页数。After this event occurs, the property of the form contains the actual number of pages for the form. ## Examples 有关完整的代码示例, 请参阅属性的示例。For a complete code example, see the example for the property.

value.span: 在支持标题与页内容分离的设备上，可以将标题呈现为窗体的一部分（例如，在浏览器的标题栏中使用 HTML 的标题标记）。

span.span: The title can be rendered as part of the form, on devices that support a title separate from page content (for example, on the title bar of a browser using the title tag in HTML).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于支持独立于页面内容的标题的设备, 可以将标题呈现为窗体的一部分。For devices that support a title separate from the page content, you can render the title as part of the form.
